what: @title Plot of experimental and simulated profile inventories — plot
title: @title Plot of experimental and simulated profile inventories — plot
text: @description  'plot' returns two plots corresponding experimental simulated inventories profile defined input data. Automatic function execute radi_start. creates results folder current directory exist.

title: @title Plot of experimental and simulated profile inventories — plot
@title Plot of experimental and simulated profile inventories — plot
text: @details  'plot' function performs several operations create save combined plot displaying two types inventories: one experimental one simulated. first creates "results" folder within directory specified dir2. May delete inner files results folder already exists. delete previous  , reads two text files, _num.txt _exp.txt, directory specified dir1. Next, creates dataframes containing necessary data plotting. calculates axis limits labels using data data1 data2. Subsequently, generates separate plots experimental simulated inventories using ggplot2. plots combined single plot using plot_layout() function. combined plot saved PNG file within results folder, name based last ID data2. Finally, combined plot displayed console. function utilizes ggplot2 dplyr extensively data manipulation visualization. @param data1 Dataframe numeric vectors. Read input data CSV format.  @param data2 dataframe numeric vectors. Filtered values data1 current 'ID'.  @param dir1 Directory. Temporary working directory '_num.txt' '_exp.txt' files created.  @param dir2 Directory. Current working directory. @returns Results folder dir2 n plots saved PNG based n "ID" defined data2. Results summarized TXT file results folder.
